[PROMPT]
For the above given text, please follow the rules to give SEO keywords filled three things 10 titles, 10 meta descriptions, and 1 extended description. Please note the following rules strictly
1. The title should be between 40 to 55 characters. This is must follow for both minimum and maximum limits.
2. Use the SEO Keywords in the Title
3. Meta Description should not increase 150 characters. FOLLOW THIS STRICTLY.
4. The Extended Description should contain SEO keywords and it should be around 1 small paragraph.
5. Please provide the original content without any duplication in any query. 
6. At the end provide the list of keywords used in the main description
Write down the content in [TARGETLANGUAGE]
